**Initial Release** - Pure Rust tokenizer for GGUF models

## Highlights

- ðŸ¦€ **Pure Rust** - No C++ dependencies
- ðŸ“¦ **Load from GGUF** - Read tokenizers directly from model files  
- âœ… **100% llama.cpp compatible** - Validated against reference implementation

## What's New

### Tokenizers
- **SentencePiece** - with `resegment()` algorithm (100% llama.cpp match)
- **BPE (Byte-Pair Encoding)** - priority queue merging + regex pre-tokenization

### API
```rust
Tokenizer::from_gguf_file(path) -> Result<Tokenizer>
tokenizer.encode(text, add_special_tokens) -> Result<Vec<TokenId>>
tokenizer.decode(&tokens) -> Result<String>
tokenizer.vocab_size() -> usize
tokenizer.bos_token() -> Option<TokenId>
tokenizer.eos_token() -> Option<TokenId>
```

### Validated Models
- âœ… LLaMA / Llama-2 / Llama-3 (SentencePiece)
- âœ… Phi-3 (SentencePiece)
- âœ… GPT-2 (BPE)

### Infrastructure
- GGUF v2 and v3 format support
- Comprehensive error handling with `thiserror`
- 30 tests with 100% llama.cpp match
- MIT License

## Installation

```toml
[dependencies]
shimmytok = "0.1"
```
